profile.name: Andrew Nguyen
profile.title: SOFTWARE ENGINEER | FULL STACK DEVELOPER
profile.description: Highly skilled and adaptable Full-Stack Software Engineer with proven experience in designing, developing, and deploying scalable and data-driven applications.  Adept at leveraging JavaScript, TypeScript, and React for front-end development, complemented by expertise in Express.js and .NET for robust back-end solutions.  Possessing a strong foundation in object-oriented design, parallel and distributed computing, and microservices architectures, I consistently deliver intuitive user experiences while optimizing performance and ensuring high-quality solutions in fast-paced environments. My experience spans diverse industries, including technology, consulting, and research, showcasing my ability to quickly adapt to new challenges and collaborate effectively within cross-functional teams.  I am proficient in utilizing various databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB) and cloud platforms (AWS S3, RDS, EC2), and I am committed to continuous learning and improvement, staying abreast of the latest technologies and best practices.
profile.description2: My background encompasses a blend of practical experience and academic research, resulting in a unique skillset that combines technical proficiency with analytical problem-solving abilities.  I have a proven track record of successfully delivering projects that meet and exceed client expectations, consistently demonstrating a proactive mindset and a commitment to exceeding expectations.  My experience in streamlining workflows, automating processes, and optimizing data visualization has resulted in significant improvements in efficiency and productivity for various organizations.  I am confident in my ability to contribute meaningfully to a challenging and dynamic role, leveraging my technical expertise and collaborative spirit to drive innovation and achieve ambitious goals.  I am eager to apply my skills and experience to a new opportunity where I can continue to learn and grow while making a significant contribution to a team's success.

qualifications: Bachelor of Computer Science, The University of Adelaide
affiliations: Professional memberships and associations not provided
keyAchievements: Streamlined outreach workflows by 60% and improved client engagement rates by 25% at UPP Global Technology JSC through the development of a data-driven prospecting system.
Accelerated lamb production planning time by 40% by designing a logic cut tree algorithm in Python at The University of Adelaide.
Reduced page load time by 30% and enhanced system performance at VNPT by optimizing React.js codebase through code splitting and lazy loading.

experience.title: Software Engineer - UPP Global Technology JSC (Remote)
responsibilities: Developed a data-driven prospecting system that automated client discovery and streamlined outreach workflows by 60%, improving client engagement rates by 25%.
Developed an intelligent automation system using Python to extract and process over 500 qualified sales leads.
Engineered a resilient automation framework with bot detection bypass and API integration to Salesforce.

experience.title: Software Engineer - Deloitte (Adelaide, SA)
responsibilities: Developed an efficient method to handle public transport data from RESTful APIs using Node.js, serving over 30,000 users.
Developed a dynamic map using React and Leaflet to visualize transport data, enhancing accessibility by 35%.
Actively participated in Scrum and Agile processes, collaborating with cross-functional teams.

fullExperience.title: Software Engineer - UPP Global Technology JSC (Remote)
responsibilities: Collaborated in a team of two under senior mentorship, working closely with different sales teams to deliver a data-driven prospecting system that automated client discovery, streamlined outreach workflows by 60%, and improved client engagement rates by 25%.
Developed an intelligent automation system using Python, and custom network request capture techniques to extract and process over 500 qualified sales leads from an external platform.

Engineered a resilient automation framework with bot detection bypass mechanisms and API integration to Salesforce Sales Cloud, reducing manual data entry time by 100% and enhancing lead generation workflow.
Assisted in building continuous integration/deployment processes using GitLab CI/CD, enabling automated testing and reliable production deployments for the system.

fullExperience.title: Software Engineer - Deloitte (Adelaide, SA)
responsibilities: Assisted in developing an efficient method to handle public transport data from external RESTful APIs using Node.js, incorporating user parameters to filter and enable real-time data access and integrate it with the Smarter Roads platform, serving over 30,000 users with seamless transport data insights.

Developed a dynamic map using React and Leaflet library to visualize backend transport data that transforms complex data into intuitive visualizations, enhancing accessibility by 35%, and enabling users to seamlessly explore bus, tram, and train routes.

Actively participated in Scrum and Agile processes, collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver iterative solutions on time, fostering a culture of continuous improvement and adaptability while meeting project goals and client needs in a fast-paced environment.

fullExperience.title: Research Assistant - The University of Adelaide (Adelaide, SA)
responsibilities: Accelerated lamb production planning time by 40% by designing a logic cut tree algorithm in Python to optimize meat cutting patterns.
Boosted production profits by 25% by developing a constraint generation algorithm that converts cut tree structures into optimized cutting patterns for minimizing waste.
Increased operational efficiency by 35% by implementing an Integer Linear Programming (ILP) optimization model that automates cutting sequence decisions based on product specifications.

Collaborated with researchers to provide training and support that sped up onboarding by 25%, while promoting knowledge-sharing and teamwork to ensure smooth integration and sustainable impact on the production process.

fullExperience.title: Software Engineer - Vietnam Posts and Telecommunications Group (VNPT) (Ha Noi, Viet Nam)
responsibilities: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop and optimize the UI for displaying customer behavior insights (Social Class, Relationship Prediction, Air Travel) in the CUSTOMER 360 project using ReactJS and Redux.
Worked closely with backend teams to integrate APIs and synchronize real-time data, streamlining the flow of customer insights and enabling more accurate, data-driven decisions.
Contributed to optimizing the React.js codebase through code splitting and lazy loading, reducing page load time by 30%, and enhancing system performance.

Played a key role in designing an intuitive dashboard and adjusting multi-dimensional network-wide views using D3.js and Chart.js, making complex data accessible and actionable for non-technical users.

Worked collaboratively in an agile environment using JIRA and Git workflow with project managers and cross-functional team to meet deadlines, resolve challenges, and deliver high-quality software solutions.
